alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:20PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima County through 300 PM MST... At 220 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Ajo, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ajo, Hickiwan, Why, Charco 27 and San Simon West. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 33 and 54. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 55, and between mile markers 67 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
